mapper.select: SELECT re_no, re_writer, TO_CHAR(re_update, 'YY-MM-DD') as re_update, TO_CHAR(re_update, 'HH24:MI') as re_update_time, re_content, bd_forum_no, bd_post_no FROM booking_community_board_reply WHERE bd_post_no = #{bd_post_no} ORDER BY re_no desc
mapper.delete: /* Reply - replyDelete */ DELETE FROM booking_community_board_reply WHERE re_no = #{re_no}
/* Reply - replyChoiceDelete */ DELETE FROM booking_community_board_reply bd_post_no = #{bd_post_no}
